DOC.brief_title: Large Volume Bupivacaine 0.5 % Versus Small Volume Elective Caesarean Section
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective double-blind randomize study , design include case two group ( use epical program sample size calculation ) , one study group one control group ( parallel ) . Each group least 30 female patient schedule elective caesarean section total 60 case .
